title: FS T206 Doolin Font Miscut- (Lowered Price 8/9)

posts.post_title: FS T206 Doolin Font Miscut- (Lowered Price 8/9)
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone.

I am looking to sell my T206 Doolin Front miscut. This is a more severe example with the player split on the card so his body is on the top of the card and his neck and head on the bottom of the card.. 

$4000... includes shipping and insurance.. payment by paypal gift or money order.... any questions can be emailed to me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]
[URL=http://s251.photobucket.com/user/blunder19/media/doolin%20front_zpsj3eab6iu.jpg.html][IMG]http://i251.photobucket.com/albums/gg309/blunder19/doolin%20front_zpsj3eab6iu.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://s251.photobucket.com/user/blunder19/media/doolin%20Back_zpsavxfdrso.jpg.html][IMG]http://i251.photobucket.com/albums/gg309/blunder19/doolin%20Back_zpsavxfdrso.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Jamie, great card, good luck.

Sorry I missed you in AC, but I did get to meet Johnny (and others). Fun time.
